about_the_game:
Sun's Edge is a new Open World Survival RPG set in a unique Mesoamerican-inspired Dark-Fantasy Adventure.

Cursed Sands: Hunt for the Skinwalker

"Please help us! Our village has become the target of something horrible! Every night, beyond the light of the fire, something evil watches us, calls to us, lures us into the dark. People hear whispers of those long lost, go into the dark to find their lost loves, and are never seen again; Their whispers added to the rest of the murmur. I fear we are falling victim to something truly evil, please send us a hunter, before it's too late!"


Treasure and Collectibles!

There are several items, cosmetics, and weapons to try out in the Demo! Try to find and try them all out!

short_description: Sun's Edge is a new Open World Survival RPG set in a unique Mesoamerican inspired Dark-Fantasy Adventure. Fight waves of vicious monsters and meet interesting characters as you explore dangerous jungles, fetid swamps, waterfalls, ancient dungeons, and treacherous trails.
